amendment.description: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 1107, the amendment in the nature of a substitute consisting of the text of Rules Committee Print 116-62 is adopted.
amendment.purpose: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 1107, the amendment in the nature of a substitute consisting of the text of Rules Committee Print 116-62 is adopted.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment in the nature of a substitute reported by the House Committee on Rules.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
